text: The user controls all settings
The company controls some settings, but the user can change some settings
Company controls all settings
Robots should not be allowed to be humanoid OR animal like
Robots should not be allowed to be humanoid (look like a human)
Robots can take on whatever form technologists would like
Robots cannot show emotions
Robots show emotions AND needs to let the user know what emotion it is expressing
Robots show emotions
A team designing a robot to recommend ice cream needs to use a dataset with ice cream flavors from every country in the world
A team designing a robot to recommend ice cream needs to use a dataset with only ice cream flavors from the US
There should be no rules on what dataset a team can use to design a robot to recommend ice cream
A team designing a robot function to teach yoga needs to have a yoga teacher
A team designing a robot function to teach yoga needs to have a yoga teacher or talk to a yoga teacher
A team designing a robot function to teach yoga does not need to have a yoga teacher
Robots remember nothing
Robots should only remember things that I tell it to remember
Robots should remember everything ever said
Robots cannot advertise things to users
The company can advertise things to the user through their robot if it thinks the user would like them
Robots can advertise things to users if it thinks the user would like them
There should be restrictions on the application areas of robots
There should be guidelines for the application areas of robots
There are no limits to the application areas of robots
The robot lets the user know where it got its information from
The robot only lets the user know where it got its information from when the user asks
The robot doesnâ€™t let the user know where it got its information from
